text: @realDonaldTrump Prove this claim, liar. All we see is you asking our police and military to dominate the American people with tear gas, rubber bullets, batons, helmets, and shields. COVID-19 is destroying our economy and our people and you are campaigning to be tyrant king of a once great land.
